src:
Persaingan Ketat, Valverde Minta Dembele Rebut Tempat di Skuat Inti
05 Nov 2019, 05:28 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pada musim lalu, Ousmane Dembele berhasil mengukuhkan satu tempat di skuat inti Barcelona. Penyerang asal Prancis itu menyumbang 14 gol dalam 42 penampilannya di semua kompetisi.
Namun pada musim ini, sosoknya justru semakin dilupakan oleh sang pelatih, Ernesto Valverde. Belakangan ini, Valverde lebih mengutamakan pemain lain seperti Antoine Griezmann dan Ansu Fati untuk menemani Lionel Messi serta Luis Suarez di lini depan.
Sosoknya bahkan tidak terlihat, baik di lapangan maupun bangku cadangan, saat Barcelona bertemu Levante dalam ajang La Liga akhir pekan kemarin. Padahal hukuman larangan bermain yang dijatuhkan untuknya sudah berakhir.
Barcelona sendiri menelan kekalahan dalam pertandingan tersebut. Bermain di markas Levante, Ciutat de Valencia, sang juara bertahan La Liga itu tumbang dengan skor 1-3.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Tight Competition, Valverde Asks Dembele to Seize a Place in the Core Squad
05 Nov 2019, 05:28 by Bola.net
Bola.net - In the last season, Ousmane Dembele managed to establish a place in Barcelona's core squad. The French striker contributed 14 goals in 42 appearances in all competitions.
But this season, his figure was even more forgotten by the coach, Ernesto Valverde. Lately, Valverde prioritizes other players such as Antoine Griezmann and Ansu Fati to accompany Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez on the front lines.
His figure was not even visible, both on the field and bench, when Barcelona met Levante in the La Liga event last weekend. Though the penalty for the prohibition of playing that was handed down for him was over.
Barcelona itself defeat in the match. Playing at Levante headquarters, Ciutat de Valencia, the defending La Liga champions were toppled with a score of 1-3.

Scroll down to read full information.
